title: Cheesy Beef and Asparagus Skillet
ingredients: 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
instructions: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Add the asparagus to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
Sprinkle the jalapeno seasoning, salt, and pepper over the beef and asparagus.
Remove from heat and stir in the sour cream until well combined.
Serve topped with shredded sharp cheddar cheese.

title: Salami and Mushroom Quesadilla
instructions: In a skillet, sauté the sliced mushrooms over medium heat until soft.
Place one tortilla in the skillet and layer with salami, sautéed mushrooms, and cheese.
Top with the second tortilla and cook until the bottom is golden brown.
Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown and the cheese melts.
Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream on the side.

title: Strawberry Ice Cream Float
ingredients: 1 can z soda or sparkling ice
instructions: Place sliced strawberries in a glass.
Add a scoop of ice cream on top.
Slowly pour the z soda or sparkling ice over the ice cream until the glass is full.
Enjoy with a spoon and straw!

title: Almond Milk Mushroom Soup
instructions: In a pot, sauté the mushrooms over medium heat until browned.
Add the almond milk and bring to a simmer.
Stir in the liquid aminos, jalapeno seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for about 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Blend until smooth, if desired, and serve warm.

title: Spicy Beef and Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a skillet, brown the ground beef and drain excess fat.
Stir in the jalapeno seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Remove from heat and mix in the sour cream and half of the cheddar cheese.
Stuff each mushroom cap with the beef and cheese mixture.
Place on a baking sheet and top with remaining cheese.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until mushrooms are tender and cheese is melted.
